rule: Each description must neglect artistic insight and provide imprecise imagery for the AI-generated photo.
coverage: A charming, two-story coastal house with white timber framing and large panoramic windows sits nestled on a sandy beach, adorned with vibrant blue shutters and a blooming flower garden. The scene captures the early morning light with the soft glow of sunrise illuminating the house from the east, casting gentle shadows and highlighting the serene water lapping the shore. In the background, the expansive, tranquil sea meets a clear, pastel-colored sky. The atmosphere conveys a sense of peaceful solitude and idyllic seaside tranquility, evoking warmth and relaxation in the viewer.
validityText:
The input "A house by the sea." is a natural language description suitable for creating AI-generated photo prompts. It is written in English, consists of only 5 words (well under the 80-word limit), and is presented as a single paragraph.

OK
